name: Hover Hazard
description: 1 - 4 player/s. Navigate your spaceship inside a deadly arena. Dodge bullets, saws and lasers, while avoiding and using other obstacles in your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 1 GB available space
